task.title: Sweet Dreams
task.shortdesc: Here we will learn about the sleeping arrangments during the stay at NOVA

context.p: Maggie will be staying in her old bedroom at her parent's house. She will be sleeping in her childhood bed. She needs to feel comfortable so that she gets the rest she needs before heading back to Blacksburg.

step.cmd: Bring essential sleeping materials from Blacksburg to Chantilly (pillows, teddy bears, etc.)
Prepare to sleep in seven days a week
